title: You have chosen not to attend the hearing
sendInEvidence: You can still send in evidence to support your appeal. You’ll be sent an address where you can post it. You’ll receive this by {{ byPostOrEmail }} after you’ve submitted your appeal.
changeYouMind: If you change your mind about attending the hearing, you can write or phone. The contact details will be on the first email or letter you receive after submitting your appeal.
